subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Mount St. Mary’s got its first NCAA tournament victory by beating Coppin State in an opening-round game in Dayton, Ohio, that matched two teams that know a lot about losing.
snippet: Mount St. Mary’s got its first NCAA tournament victory by beating Coppin State in an opening-round game in Dayton, Ohio, that matched two teams that know a lot about losing.
